features.title: Isolated cloud execution
features.description: Every task runs in a fresh Fly Machine. No local setup, no state leaking between runs.

features.title: Any agent, same workflow
features.description: Route issues to Opencode, Claude Code, or Amp. Switch agents without leaving GitHub.

features.title: You own your credentials
features.description: API keys live in a private Gist you control. Porter reads them at runtime, never stores them.

features.title: No platform fee
features.description: You pay for Fly compute and model tokens. Porter takes nothing on top.
